title: Sine Curve
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Donald Batchelor
brief_description: Discusses the sine funtion. Illustrates familiar periodic motions and uses models to analyse the nature of a wave motion and to show how a sine curve can be drawn. From the series “Visions in mathematics”.
